text: Dialogue or dialog is a shared inquiry or the art of thinking together.Isaacs, William. (2010). Dialogue and the Art of Thinking Together, p.1. Dialogue is a rhetorical, literary and theatrical format. It means a written or spoken conversational exchange between two or more people, or a literary work showing such an exchange. The historical origins of dialogue are in classical Greek and Indian literature. The Socratic method is a way of learning things by dialogue. ==Related pages== * Online chat * Communication * Conflict resolution * Conversation * Xiangsheng * Manzai ==References== ==Other websites== * National Coalition for Dialogue and Deliberation * Smith, M. K. (2001) Dialogue and conversation, the encyclopaedia of informal education * The Journal of Inter-Religious Dialogue Category:Fiction Category:Rhetoric Category:Philosophical methodology
title: Dialogue
